name: Farm Life Alpha Build
description:
The year is 2009 and there is a popular farm game going around the internet. Everyone is playing it, and even if they aren't playing it, they are getting stupid notifications from the friends. Fast forward 11 years and this game is still around, but is a shadow of its former glory. That beloved game has morphed and mutated to something horrendous, virtually unplayable. 

Those who seek to experience days bygone and play the fun version will only be disappointed while searching through the internet, or through various appstores because there is nothing like that game from a decade ago....until now. 

Farm Life is an old school farming sim where all you have to worry about is money and time. With enough of either currency, you will be able to accomplish anything in game. No premium currencies, no "help" from friends. Just you, and the farm. 

Come and play test the first edition of a much larger idea. Experience 26 different crops with more on the way. Be on the look out for updates that will add: Farm Expansions, Animals, Trees, and Decorations. 

Thank you for playing this game and I hope to see you future editions. 

------CONTROLS-----

  • Move the screen with WASD, or with the mouse at screen edges, but the feature needs to be 'unlocked' with Space Bar. 
  • Click the hamburger menu to open all the tools. 
  • Click a tool to activate it and use it. 
  • Plow, Plant, Harvest, Repeat
  • In the market, find the crop you want and click the buy button, then click on plowed plots to plant the seed
  • Auto save interval is 5 minutes
  • Click the settings to save or load manually
  • if you close the game and relaunch, click the load button to load your progress, if any time has passed, it will be added to the crops.
